feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:15 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 4:35 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NW 51 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
